description:
This 100 % polyester sweater-knit polar fleece offers exceptional warmth and insulation, keeping you comfortable even in chilly conditions. The advanced fabric technology ensures optimal heat retention while allowing for breathability, so you can stay cozy without overheating during high-intensity activities.

Equipped with a YKK® coil zipper featuring a semi-automatic lock slider, this fleece minimizes noise during your movements, allowing you to maintain stealth while hunting or exploring the wilderness. The attention to detail in the design ensures a seamless outdoor experience.

Practicality meets functionality with two zippered handwarmer pockets and a zippered chest pocket. These secure pockets provide ample space to store your essentials, keeping them easily accessible throughout your adventures. Whether it's your phone, keys, or other small items, you can rest assured they will be safe and within reach.
name: Hooke Full-Zip Sweater Fleece - Mens

specs.value: Made of 100% polyester sweater-knit polar fleece
